price: Mamamalagi naman ang mukha ng Panginoon mo, ang ukol sa pagkapinagpipitaganan at pinagpaparangalan.
arabic: وَيَبۡقَىٰ وَجۡهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wayabqā wajhu rabbika dhū al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
